channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Could Happen If TikTok Gets Banned In The U.S.?
item.description: The looming TikTok ban could force 170 million Americans to find new ways to create and consume short-form video content.

item.title: In Sizing Up Future AI Power Requirements, It PaysTo Watch For Zombies
item.description: Yes, AI will have many uses, some of which we can only imagine today, but we may be over-estimating future power requirements.
